meanings.sent1: She walked drizzlingly through the light rain.
meanings.sent2: The rain fell drizzlingly on the roof of the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked up drizzlingly at the sky, wondering if it would ever stop raining.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed drizzlingly through the room, creating a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted drizzlingly, adding delicate details to the canvas.
